channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 21:16 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 21:16 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow the following messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 17:47 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 17:47 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
